channel.title: The Art of Technology... Training - Josef Seiler Chris Kefalas

item.title: Robot Camp
item.description:
Summer 2016 Robot Camp

Students started their robot camp with new friends and a plethora of unattached hardware: motors, wires, screws, chasis plates, battery holders and more!

The first part of camp entailed assembling all these parts using screwdrivers and determination. As the campers were guided through the process of â€¦
item.dc:creator: Josef Seiler Chris Kefalas
